title: SVR Clover Stats Analyst
description: Player- and tournament-level performance analysis capturing movement, reaction, decision time, damage, kills and derived indicators to inform training and strategy.
captions: Raw player statistics table with movement and reaction timers â€” cleaned snapshot of per-match recordings used to generate metrics.
Correlation heatmap showing relationships between key features (damage, kills, survival, movement and reaction times) and the derived "WillImprove" indicator.
Interpretation table summarizing how each feature correlates with the "WillImprove" score and recommended focus areas.
Per-match player breakdown and aggregate bar charts comparing damage, kills, survival, movement and timing metrics across players.
